name: TriNet
description: TriNet (NYSE: TNET) provides small and medium-size businesses (SMBs) with full-service HR solutions tailored by industry. To free SMBs from HR complexities, TriNet offers access to human capital expertise, benefits, risk mitigation and compliance, payroll and real-time technology. From Main Street to Wall Street, TriNet empowers SMBs to focus on what matters most—growing their business.
Headline: Trade HR complexity for certainty
ShortDescription: From Main Street to Wall Street, TriNet empowers SMBs to focus on what matters most

Highlights.name: HR Consulting Expertise
Highlights.description: Receive guidance on intricate HR challenges so you can maintain best practices.

Highlights.name: Access to Big-Company Benefits
Highlights.description: Seamlessly manage—and give employees access to—comprehensive benefits packages.

Highlights.name: Contractor and Global Workforce Support
Highlights.description: Pay independent contractors and integrate with partners for your international personnel.

enhanced_description: TriNet (NYSE: TNET) offers comprehensive, full-service HR solutions specifically tailored for small and medium-size businesses (SMBs). The platform aims to alleviate HR complexities by providing access to human capital expertise, robust benefits administration, risk mitigation and compliance guidance, payroll processing, and real-time technology. TriNet's offerings include expert HR consulting for intricate challenges and best practices, access to comprehensive 'big-company' benefits packages for employees, and support for managing and paying independent contractors, as well as integration with partners for international personnel. This allows SMBs, from Main Street to Wall Street, to confidently grow and adapt by focusing on core business objectives, ensuring certainty in HR operations while scaling with variable costs.
key_use_cases: Ensuring HR risk mitigation and compliance
Managing variable HR costs during scaling
Providing guidance on HR best practices
Supporting international personnel and global workforce needs
competitive_advantages: Full-service HR solutions tailored by industry
Access to human capital expertise and consulting
Strong focus on risk mitigation and compliance
Support for contractor and global workforce management
Ability to trade HR complexity for certainty
Flexible, variable cost model that scales with business growth
integration_capabilities: Integration with partners for international personnel
roi_benefits: Reduced HR complexities and administrative burden
Increased ability for SMBs to focus on core business growth
Enhanced confidence in business adaptation and growth
Improved certainty and predictability in HR operations
Cost optimization through variable HR expenses that scale with business needs
Improved employee satisfaction and retention through comprehensive benefits access
Reduced legal and operational risks through expert compliance guidance
primary_users: Employees (for benefits access and related self-service)
scalability_features: Support for business growth and adaptation
Variable cost model that scales with the business
Capability to manage benefits for a growing workforce
Support for independent contractors and international personnel
